articles.author: Erica Werner
articles.title: Some lawmakers confront Trump administration over coronavirus response
articles.description: Lawmakers confronted administration officials at closed-door briefings Wednesday about the response to the coronavirus, including lack of communication with state and local officials and the need for more funding.
articles.content:
Sen. Brian Schatz (D-Hawaii) challenged Azar about the communication breakdown, and Azar grew defensive, although he later apologized to Schatz, according to one person in attendance who spoke on condition of anonymity to describe what occurred.

articles.author: Anna Fifield
articles.title: China's conspicuously absent leader reemerges — for an audience with a friendly autocrat
articles.description: Xi Jinping has talked about waging a battle against the coronavirus but has not visited the front lines.
articles.content:
But as the number of people infected with the coronavirus ticked up through 10,000 and then 20,000, as the death toll rose through 300 and then 400, Xi was nowhere to be seen.

articles.author: Simon Denyer, The Washington Post
articles.title: Trapped on virus-ravaged cruise ship, shocked passengers struggle to keep spirits up...

YOKOHAMA, Japan - Quarantined for two weeks on a cruise ship ravaged by coronavirus, the Britons on board have only one option: keep calm and carry on.

articles.title: Unknowns of the new virus make global quarantines a struggle
articles.description: Halting the spread of a new virus that has killed hundreds in China is difficult in part because important details about the illness and how it spreads are still unknown
articles.content: Governments have rushed to get their citizens out of China, which is orchestrating historys largest anti-viral campaign by blocking 50 million people from leaving Wuhan, the center of the outbreak, and nearby areas. A growing number of Chinese cities are disc… [+9174 chars]

articles.description: British honeymooners are among the 2,666 passengers confined to their cabins for two weeks after the Diamond Princess was placed in quarantine by Japanese authorities.
articles.content:

articles.title: Cases of infected pass 24,000 as more human-to-human transmissions recorded outside China
articles.description: The rate of increase for new cases discovered is rising but this coronavirus appears less lethal than its viral predecessors, though nearly 500 have died so far.
articles.content:
BEIJING As the city of Wuhan remains in lockdown, the Chinese Internet has exploded with videos and memes in support of the besieged residents.
One of the latest is a flashy video called Wuhan don't panic, we will wait for you

articles.author: Gerry Shih
articles.title: In China's virus-hit heartland, fear and loathing on the road to Wuhan
articles.description: As epidemic spreads, the lockdown of Hubei province is upending daily life along the Yangtze River, a region long connected by trade, culture and blood.
